title: YUM Food & Fun for Kids - Winter 2013 (gnv64)
description:
YUM Food & Fun for Kids - Winter2013
English | PDF | 100 Pages | 52 mb

Features
8 I Made It
An edible Christmas tree makes a delicious snack for everyone to share
11 Cool Ideas 
Create your own "snowman" without even setting foot outside; it's a great! dessert and drink all in one!
12 Cool Ideas
3 cute cheese balls are crowd-pleasers that double as centerpieces, whether you love them sweet or savory.
8 Sample the Book
Scrumptious desserts you can bake with the whole family will have you celebratinc the most wonderful time of year in a yummy way.
24 Drink
A creamy punch with a refreshing splash ogf peppermint is an easy, dazzling drink you can whip up in just 5 minutes.
28 Slow Cooker
Red-and-green risotto is a timesaving meal to make your holiday merry. 
34 Week of Dinners
Beat the holiday rush with make-ahead versions of your favorite winter comfort foods.
40 Happy Turkey Day
Celebrate Thanksgiving with a dessert table decorated with adorable treats everyone will want to gobble up.
48 The Festival of Lights
Celebrate Hanukkah with 3 recipes to kick off the Festival of Lights right.
50 Grow your Heart 3 Sizes This Grinch-mas!
Use this classic holiday tale to start a new family and community traditionÃ¢â‚¬â€a Grinch-mas good deed holiday party!
60 25 Best Holiday Cookies & Treats
Delicious sweets that make spending time together in the kitchen easy and tasty this season.
72 Let It Snow 
When it's cold outside, take the fun indoors by creating a snowy winter wonderland-themed party.
76 Santa's Workshop
Christmas crafts and treats will have your little "elves" tinkering away all day at this fun party.
80 Hung With Care
Have a ball maing holiday ornaments and nibbling on cookies at this party where the kids can get creative.	
86 Christmas Traditions Around the World
Make your holiday celebrations last longer this year by trying new ones from across the globe!
90 Ring In the New year
Throw a New Year's Eve bash early with a breakfast bar so that kids can join in on all the festivities.

On the Cover
Homemade Holiday! 25 festive cookies & healthy treats
Thanksgiving recipes, Hanukkah ideas and more!
Throw a Grinch party, plus 6 more winter party plans
Gifts from the kitchen

Healthy Eats
10 Snack Time
Santas made from strawberries make eating fruit fun and festive.
14 A+ Diet
Healthy veggie trays will be the life of the partyÃ¢â‚¬â€Shaped as a Christmas tree, wreath or turkey.
16 Stealthy Healthy
Who says holiday goodies can't be healthy, too? Here are 3 must-have recipes your kids will love
30 Breakfast
The whole family will rise and shine for this breakfast confection
32 Lunch
Baked potatoes two ways give a whole new meaning to the phrase "hot potatoes." 

Helpful Ideas
7 kitchen Tools
Great finds for all of your holiday baking fun
22 Pretty Please
Great gifts for the cooking-lovers on your listÃ¢â‚¬â€all for less than $35.
26 The Season of Giving
Easy homemade treats will make a big impression as thoughtful holiday gifts from the heart.
98 Splurge
A cake with serious "wow" factor also serves as a centerpiece at your Thanksgiving table.

Extras
5 Recipe Index
6 Editor's Letter
94 Reader Recipe Request - Homemade Hot Fudqde Sauce
